acceptance_criteria: The system should apply the suspensive condition to each loan if the amount exceeds 10% of the total credit when the borrower uses multiple loans for the same operation.
The suspensive condition must be integrated with the display of the annual effective rate (from User Story 1).
The suspensive condition must be integrated with the lender's risk management system (from User Story 5).
The system should not allow the borrower to proceed with multiple loans until all suspensive conditions are met and the risk management system approves the operation.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to ensure that autonomous guarantees are not subscribed to for credits under Chapters II and III of the relevant title, and also verify that the system handles multiple guarantee types and regulatory changes, so that I can comply with regulations and adapt to future changes.
acceptance_criteria: The system should prevent the subscription of autonomous guarantees for credits under Chapters II and III of the relevant title.
The system should support multiple guarantee types, including autonomous guarantees, for future regulatory changes.
The system should allow administrators to update regulatory compliance rules as needed.
The system should provide a report on the compliance status of all guarantees.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to see a clear indication that the rate will be defined after studying my situation, along with a detailed breakdown of all potential rates and their implications, so that I can understand the credit simulation process and make an informed decision.
acceptance_criteria: The system should clearly indicate that the rate will be defined after studying the borrower's situation.
The system should provide a detailed breakdown of all potential rates and their implications.
The system should allow the borrower to compare different rate scenarios.
The system should include a disclaimer that the final rate may vary based on additional factors.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to understand the components of the total cost of the credit, including mandatory insurance, so that I can make an informed decision.
acceptance_criteria: The system should display the total cost of the credit.
The system should include mandatory insurance as a separate line item in the total cost breakdown.
The system should provide a tooltip or explanation for each component of the total cost, including mandatory insurance.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to finance the acquisition of multiple types of real estate properties, including residential, commercial, and industrial, without immediately mobilizing a large sum and with flexible repayment options that adapt to market conditions, so that I can have a comprehensive and adaptable financing solution for all my real estate investments.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow financing the acquisition of residential, commercial, and industrial real estate properties without immediately mobilizing a large sum.
The system should provide flexible repayment options that adapt to market conditions.
The system should offer a comprehensive financing solution for all types of real estate investments.
The system should ensure that the financing solution is adaptable to changing market conditions and borrower needs.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to receive some pre-contractual information that might include the annual effective rate, total amount in euros over an extended period, total loan duration, and amount per payment period so that I have a general idea of the loan's conditions and obligations before an offer is made.
acceptance_criteria: The pre-contractual information should ideally be expressed in the annual effective rate.
The total amount should be displayed in euros over an extended period, possibly eight years.
The total loan duration should be stated if available.
The amount per payment period should be specified if possible.
It would be good to specify if the amount is added to the loan repayment installment.
The pre-contractual information should be provided around the same time as any document containing numerical elements on insurance.

user_stories.user_story: As a consumer, I want to be informed of the credit usage terms in all advertising and receive periodic updates about my loan status so that I can make informed decisions about the loan application and manage my loan effectively.
acceptance_criteria: All advertising must include information on the credit usage terms.
The borrower must be provided with information on the remaining capital to be repaid at least once a year.
The borrower must receive updates on the loan status, including changes in interest rates, at least quarterly.
The borrower must be notified of any changes in regulatory compliance that affect their loan.

user_stories.user_story: As a lender, I want to ensure that the value of in-kind premiums offered during a credit operation does not exceed the threshold set by the ministerial decree, taking into account various exceptions and special cases, so that I comply with regulations.
acceptance_criteria: The value of in-kind premiums must not exceed the threshold set by the ministerial decree.
The system must handle multiple exceptions and special cases, which may not be fully defined at the start.
The system must allow for manual overrides by authorized personnel in certain scenarios.
The system must log all overrides and exceptions for audit purposes.

user_stories.user_story: As a lender, I want to be able to increase the interest rate within limits set by decree in case of borrower default, considering multiple unspecified factors, so that I can manage risks associated with defaults within legal limits and other complex considerations.
acceptance_criteria: The interest rate increase must be within the limits set by decree.
The increased interest rate must apply until the borrower resumes normal repayment.
The interest rate increase should consider various unspecified factors that may affect the risk management strategy.
The system should allow for manual adjustments based on unspecified criteria.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to ensure that each loan is subject to the suspensive condition of the approval of each other loan if the amount exceeds 10% of the total credit when using multiple loans for the same operation, and I want to be notified of the approval status of each loan in real-time, so that I do not commit to multiple loans without guarantee of their approval and I am always informed about the loan status.
acceptance_criteria: Each loan must be subject to the suspensive condition of the approval of each other loan if the amount exceeds 10% of the total credit.
The system must send real-time notifications to the borrower about the approval status of each loan.
The notifications must be sent via email and SMS.
The borrower must be able to view the approval status of all loans in their account dashboard.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want to ensure that autonomous guarantees cannot be subscribed to for credits under Chapters II and III of the relevant title, and I want to be notified about other potential guarantee options and their implications, so that I comply with regulations and make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: Autonomous guarantees must not be subscribed to for credits under Chapters II and III of the relevant title.
The system should provide a list of alternative guarantee options.
The system should display the implications of each guarantee option.
The borrower should be able to select and compare different guarantee options.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want a credit simulation that clearly indicates that the rate will be defined after studying my situation and does not include mandatory insurance, but only after the pre-contractual information has been provided, and the simulation must be generated within 24 hours of the request. Additionally, the simulation should include a detailed breakdown of all potential fees, a comparison with other loan options, and a risk assessment based on my financial history. The simulation should also consider various economic factors and future market trends. However, the simulation will not provide a final cost estimate but rather a rough approximation, so that I have a general idea of the total cost of the credit.
acceptance_criteria: The credit simulation should somehow indicate that the rate will be defined after studying the borrower's situation.
The total cost of the credit should generally not include mandatory insurance (death guarantee, total and irreversible loss of autonomy, work incapacity, and permanent disability).
The credit simulation should be available after the pre-contractual information has been provided.
The credit simulation should be generated relatively quickly after the request.
The simulation should include a detailed breakdown of all potential fees.
The simulation should include a comparison with other loan options.
The simulation should include a risk assessment based on the borrower's financial history.
The simulation should consider various economic factors and future market trends.
The simulation will provide a rough approximation of the total cost of the credit.

user_stories.user_story: As a borrower, I want a mortgage loan that allows financing the acquisition of real estate without immediately mobilizing a large sum, but with a higher interest rate and additional processing fees, so that I have a financing solution.
acceptance_criteria: The mortgage loan must allow financing the acquisition of real estate without immediately mobilizing a large sum.
The mortgage loan must include a higher interest rate compared to standard loans.
The mortgage loan must include additional processing fees.
